name: CMPedometerEvent
desc: A change in the user's pedestrian activity.

items.name: var date: Date
items.desc: The date on which the pedometer event was recorded.

items.name: var type: CMPedometerEventType
items.desc: The type of change that occurred.

items.name: enum CMPedometerEventType
items.desc: Constants indicating the change that occurred to the user's pedestrian activity.
